abstract: Senior administration officials say Pres Obama plans to leave empty seat in House gallery when he delivers his last State of the Union address to symbolize victims of gun violence; gesture will be latest in concerted public relations push to promote more regulation of firearms.
snippet: The president plans to leave an empty seat in the House gallery when he delivers his final State of the Union address to symbolize the victims of gun violence....
lead_paragraph: The president plans to leave an empty seat in the House gallery when he delivers his final State of the Union address to symbolize the victims of gun violence.

headline.main: Obama to Leave Empty Seat for Gun Victims in State of the Union Audience
headline.print_headline: Obama to Leave Seat for Gun Victims During Address
